@howardowens Congratulations, you win the shoe-leather curmudgeon prize.
@howardowens And by the way, I don't think "data journalism" is fancy. It *is* basic. But only if you learn that basic.
@howardowens No, you were dismissive of data journalism as something a local news org didn't need to screw with. That's nonsense.
@howardowens You could access government databases in minutes online to find answers in breaking news in 1920? Cool, didn't know that.
@howardowens If the information is online, you can do it from your desk as a breaking story. Using data.
@howardowens That's a fancy name? It's a basic skill.
@howardowens BTW, if you're not telling whether that's the most dangerous intersection in town, you're not all over it. Data journalism.
@howardowens Yeah, because no one from Batavia would drive a half-hour to see the pope.
@howardowens OK, it's an outlier.
@howardowens Perhaps your competition is pretty limited.
@howardowens I guarandamntee you when news like 9/11 happens, people in Batavia, and every other community, are talking about just 1 story.
@howardowens Effective data skills help you find local information quickly that others aren't bothering or aren't skilled enough to find.
@howardowens Good for you, but you're lucky your competitors don't have strong data skills or they'll start kicking your ass.
@howardowens Bullshit. Effective, quick data analysis helps you dominate your market. You can quickly get info no one else has.
@howardowens C'mon, Howard! That was local news in every community in the country. We localized the hell out of it & everyone did.
@howardowens You know a lot. But lots of journos know data can be useful in a wide variety of local stories, including breaking news.
@howardowens That wasn't breaking news? I reported security infractions at local airport using data.
@howardowens For instance, I used data in a breaking story on 9/11.
@howardowens Data journalism can take time, but it can be done on the fly, and I've seen breaking news coverage benefit from data.
@howardowens Some do a good job without engagement. Others make a point of it. It seldom happens accidentally.
.@howardowens If you have the resources to cover local breaking news, you have the resources to engage while doing it. And to use data.
.@howardowens They're not mutually exclusive. Engagement & data can be useful in breaking news coverage.
